title: Admission to Hogwarts
startingPoint1:
Welcome young wizards!

To complete your enrollment at Hogwarts, you will have to follow me during our visit to the library! Be very attentive...
startingPoint2:
And it's also likely that I have a few riddles along the way...

First, make your way to your starting point!
startingPoint3: That seems like a good start... To know where to go next, how about giving me a famous quote?
startingPointQuest2: Find a quote related to your starting point.
startingPoint4: Mmm... Maybe you're not such bad wizards after all...
bookSearch1: Hi! I hope McGonagall didn't scare you too much... I'm sure she'd be cooler with you if you brought back her favorite book!
bookSearchQuest1Level1: Find the book 'Les apprentis sorciers du climat (Clive Hamilton)'.
bookSearch2: Great! Let's check if you found the right book!
bookSearchQuest2Level0: Enter the last word on page 128.
bookSearchQuest2Level1: Enter the last word on page 100.
printArea1:
Oh my! A gift for me already? That's kind of you, I've been looking for this book for ages...

You deserve the right to visit our print area!
printArea2:
Here, all wizards can print documents!

You can easily pay with your student card.
printAreaQuest2: What is the largest paper size available?
printArea3: Are you sure you're new?! You'll end up skipping a grade...
comicSpace1:
Hi, I'm Luna!

Would you like to see our common room? It's a nice place, you'll see!
comicSpace2:
Here you can come to read or even relax!

But... Only if you know the Ravenclaw motto?
comicSpaceQuest2: Find a quote related to the comic & manga area.
comicSpace3: Ah, you reassure me! For a moment, I thought you were infiltrated Slytherins...
workRoom1:
Hey, come back here!

The library is also a place for work and quiet... But if you ever want to work in groups, it's possible!
workRoom2: These workrooms can be booked via the Affluences mobile app (minimum 3 people)!
workRoomQuest2: Find a quote related to the room.
libraryHours1:
It's me again!

I saw how well you handled the library website... I hope you noted the opening hours!
libraryHoursQuest1: Find the latest possible closing time.
libraryHours2:
You're really good!

I'm sure you'll enjoy it here!
endBeforeQuiz:
Well, I must say all of this seems more than alright!

I believe everything is [...]
quizIntro1: Apparently, I'm not asked for my opinion on your case... I still have the right to evict Muggles trying to join the wizards!
quizIntro2: I have a few questions before I let you enjoy Hogwarts...
quizEnd:
You are definitely ready to enter Hogwarts...

Congratulations!
